statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 3 \\ 5 \\ -5 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -28 \\ -12 \\ -16 \\ 8 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
